speaker.title: Join Speakers
speaker.header: ReactConf is a full-day conference organised by a group of JS programmers from all around the country. For this year's event, we are honored to invite everybody to submit their abstract for speaking at the conference. We would like to receive applications in a variety of disciplines that represent your unique experiences and creativity. Your abstracts will be reviewed by our technical committee, and speakers will be notified by email regarding the status of their abstract a month prior to the event's day.
speaker.body: Data Structures and Algorithms in JavaScript, Reactive Programming, ReactNative, Performance, State Managements, Testing Javascript Applications, Cross Platform Applications, Web Assembly, Styling in depth or anything in your passion.
